titles.title: Unemployment Tax Repeal Act of 1995
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the inclusion in gross income of unemployment compensation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/5/1997--Introduced. Unemployment Tax Repeal Act of 1995 (sic) - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the requirement to include unemployment compensation in gross income and the provision concerning the voluntary withholding on unemployment benefits.
